module.name: Voicemail
module.changelog: *2.11.1.6* FREEPBX-7326 Installer always modifies modules.conf *2.11.1.5* Part fix for #6923 language not being set. *2.11.1.4* Update license *2.11.1.2* #6471 *2.11.1.1* Fix #6967 (missing help popups) and PBXAC-12 (unable to delete greetings/recordings) *2.11.1.0* Reorganize and rework module. Clean up and fixed #6769 *2.11.0.4* #6712 *2.11.0.3* #6246 *2.11.0.2* #6111 *2.11.0.1* install_amp corner case error fix *2.11.0.0* #6015 *2.10.0.4* #5894 *2.10.0.3* #5639 *2.10.0.2* #5135, #5168 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.5* #5072 *2.9.0.4* #5036, #5062 *2.9.0.3* #5000 *2.9.0.2* #4401 *2.9.0.1* removed duplicate functions *2.9.0.0* #4653, #4734, #4736, merge vmailadmin
module.description: This module allows you to configure Voicemail for a user or extension
